bonus: For every 5 Strength purchased within range, you deal + {value} increased damage to Vulnerable targets.
additional_bonus: When an enemy is damaged by you, they become Vulnerable for 3 seconds. This cannot happen more than once every 20 seconds per enemy.
legendary_bonus: Increase damage to Vulnerable targets by x {legendary_value} .

data.name: Fester
bonus: For every 5 Dexterity purchased within range, you deal + {value} increased damage with Centipede Skills.
additional_bonus: Your Centipede Skills deal x15% increased damage to Crowd Controlled enemies.

data.name: Fitness
bonus: For every 5 Dexterity purchased within range, you deal + {value} increased Critical Strike Damage.
additional_bonus: Skills that Critically Strike generate 3 Vigor.
legendary_bonus: Increase Critical Strike Damage by x {legendary_value} .

data.name: Fulminate
bonus: For every 5 Intelligence purchased within range, you deal + {value} increased Lightning damage.
additional_bonus: You deal x12% increased Lightning damage to both Healthy and Injured enemies.

data.name: Guzzler
bonus: For every 5 Intelligence purchased within range, you deal + {value} increased damage while Healthy.
additional_bonus: You gain +30% increased Potion Healing.
legendary_bonus: Increase damage while Healthy by x {legendary_value} .

data.name: Headhunter
bonus: Grants + {value} bonus to all Normal nodes within range.
additional_bonus: You deal x10 increased damage to Elites.

data.name: Hone
bonus: For every 5 Strength purchased within range, you deal + {value} increased damage with Jaguar Skills.
additional_bonus: Dealing damage with your Jaguar Skills increases your Critical Strike Chance by +1% for 6 seconds, up to +10%.
legendary_bonus: Increase Critical Strike Damage by x {legendary_value} .

data.name: Hubris
bonus: Grants + {value} bonus to all Magic nodes within range.
additional_bonus: You gain up to 3,000 Thorns based on your Dodge Bonus.
legendary_bonus: Increase damage to Vulnerable targets by x {legendary_value} .

data.name: Innate
bonus: For every 5 Strength purchased within range, you deal + {value} increased damage with Incarnate Skills.
additional_bonus: Casting an Incarnate Skill grants you x15% Damage Reduction for 7 seconds.

data.name: Jagged Plume
bonus: For every 5 Dexterity purchased within range, you gain {value} Spirit Feather potency.
additional_bonus: Spawning a Storm Feather grants you x3% increased damage and 5% increased Movement Speed for 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

data.name: Menagerist
bonus: Grants + {value} bonus to all Magic nodes within range.
additional_bonus: Dealing damage with your Gorilla, Jaguar, Eagle, or Centipede Skills increases all damage you deal by x4% for 10 seconds, stacking once per Spirit.
legendary_bonus: Increase Incarnate skill damage by x {legendary_value} .

additional_bonus: You deal x15% increased Physical damage to Non-Elites and Bosses.
legendary_bonus: Increase damage while Healthy by x {legendary_value} .

data.name: Revenge
bonus: Grants + {value} bonus to all Rare nodes within range.
additional_bonus: Dealing Thorns damage to an enemy increases all damage it takes from you by x1%, up to x15%, for 10 seconds.

data.name: Ritual
bonus: For every 5 Intelligence purchased within range, you gain {value} Mystic Circle potency.
additional_bonus: While standing in a Mystic Circle you deal x10% increased damage and take x10% reduced damage.

additional_bonus: Critical Strikes increase the damage an enemy takes from you by x3% for 20 seconds, up to x15%.

data.name: Wildfire
bonus: For every 5 Dexterity purchased within range, you deal + {value} increased Fire damage.
additional_bonus: Lucky Hit: Damaging enemies with direct Fire damage has up a 30% chance to reduce one of your active Cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.
